Unified Platform

One Platform, Endless Potential

An all in one platform that makes order capturing, pre-payment processing, selling products with flexible configurable options experiences via app or web easier than ever.

Increase Your Bottom Line

Not only our No-Commission solution will allow you to best monetize your sales, but we are also the most affordable in the market.

A Feature-Rich Experience

Geo-Location, Working hours, Custom-Ordering, Favorites for easy re-ordering, Pre-Payment processing are only some features your patrons will enjoy.

Your Brand, Your Identity

Your Logo, your colors, your images. Don't compromise and offer a competitive experience while building a loyal and well engaged community.

Immediate Use

In every platform and device (iOS, Android, Web), and we upload every product you sell to get you started immediately.

About Us

Our Mission Is To Empower Your Business

While ever-changing market conditions can be harsh at times; there is always a proven fact, consumers want the best customer experience possible. PrepApp, developed and owned by Advantage Solutions Tech, is our answer to empower Businesses to capture as much market share as possible. Experience, Convenience and more affordable alternatives for consumers are always paramount.

"Takeout demand was up 107% versus Q1 2020 and up 144% compared to Q1 2019 ... takeout remains strong, demonstrating it has become a pandemic trend that may be here to stay ... ," According to Yelp's newly published State of the Restaurant Industry Report, June 2022. If you run a Kiosk, Store, Food Truck, Restaurant, Lodging or Hotel with In-Room service, Ghost Kitchen, Virtual Eatery, Market or any other location where your Patrons can benefit from pre-ordering (and paying) from your Branded App, then PrepApp is for You! Contact us with any questions you may have. May the fair monetization movement begin with You, Your Business, coming First!
